member.name: M:StackMiner_WebAPI.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: M:StackMiner_WebAPI.Controllers.RegisterMailVerifyController.RegisterMailConfirmation(System.String)
member.summary: Mail Verification of Member Registration
member.remarks: /// ### REMARKS ### The following codes are returned - "true" - Registration verified Successfully - "error: invalid_otp_code" - If Entered invalid OTP code - "error: something_went_wrong - If mailer link not found - "error: user_verification_id_not_found" - If user verfication code not found - "error:email_already_exist_or_sponserid_invalid" - If Email already exist - "error: please_contact_admin_or_create_support_ticket_for_activate_account" - If Failed Registration

member.name: M:StackMiner_WebAPI.Controllers.RegistrationController.NewRegistrationUsers(StackMiner_WebAPI.Models.RegistrationModel)
member.summary: New Member registration.
member.remarks: ### REMARKS ### The following codes are returned - "true" - Registration Successful - "false" - Registration Failed - "error: email_already_exist" - If user already exist with email - "error: numeric_name_not_allowed" - Name numeric not allowed - "error: name_cant_be_null_or_numeric" - Name cant be null or numeric - "error: sponser_id_invalid " - If provided SponserID is Invalid - "error: please_fill_mandatory_filled" - Please fill the mandatory filed these are the name, email, password and Mobile No

member.summary: New User Registration
Takes 31 Parameter And Executes New Join Process
member.param: Customers bank Name where his/her account exists
Paymentmode must be zero(0) if Mode is ECS else 1
Joining package Category eg. BASIC,STANDARD etc
Output type parameter, Which returns Newly Generated Customer ID
Success if Execution was sucessful else returns Error Messages
member.exception: Returns Exception message with Out Parameter
